entry.title: The Tiger and the Wolf
entry.summary:
Author: SuperCraig96

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 104,341Chapters: 46/?Kudos: 34

Summary: Everyone in Scott's circle had already found their soulmate: Stiles with Derek, Allison with Isaac… only he was alone. Scott was happy for his friends, especially for Stiles, but he felt lonely. Every day, he stared at the two letters, the initials of his soulmate, whom he didn't know: L and A, hoping to finally meet him. (Soulmate AU)

entry.title: Pack Scent
entry.summary:
Author: theauthoress

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,499Chapters: 6/10Kudos: 573

Summary: “What’s going on?”Scott made a strange, whiny noise at the back of his throat that made him sound a little like a kicked puppy. “Your scent.” He pulled on Stiles’s hoodie until their noses were practically touching.“Scott, buddy, you’re going to have to be more specific.” Stiles rubbed a circle on the back of Scott’s hand with his thumb. “You know I don’t have werewolf senses.”“You smell like… like…” Scott fumbled for words, his brow furrowed deeply. His eyes started to look a little wet, and that was something Stiles could not deal with.“Hey, hey, it’s okay. I’m okay. Just tell me what’s wrong and we’ll fix it. I’ll—I dunno—shower really good, I promise.”“You smell like something claimed you,” Scott finally said in a horrified whisper.

entry.title: This Is Not Me Falling for You (Except It Definitely Is)
entry.summary:
Author: Hathly

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,466Chapters: 5/12Kudos: 116

Summary: Stiles didn’t expect to see Derek Hale at college. Not after years of teenage antagonism, not after that one summer where Derek glared at him for breathing too loud. But suddenly Derek is here—older, hotter, and somehow the only person who knows Stiles’ schedule better than his own.Now they’re kind-of-maybe friends. If friends argued over superhero rankings, walked each other to class like it’s a rom-com, and accidentally held hands under the stars.

entry.summary:

I need you to do as I say, phone the Animal Control, tell them to come over right now, there’s a wild animal in the house.”“What?” Not a moment later, there’s a huge clatter of chairs being shoved haphazardly away and feet pounding on the floor. entry.title: Just A Bit Broken
entry.summary:
Author: stereksupremacy

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,314Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 23

Summary: Derek-The moment my eyes see Stiles I knew he was mine. Now it was just a matter of letting him see we were basically meant for each other. It shouldn't be too hard... Or will it? With too many obstacles between us, his brother included, is my love enough to win him over? They say love is hard, but how hard is too much? It doesn't matter. I will keep trying and trying even if it breaks me little by little. Stiles deserves love, and I will be the one to give it to him.Stiles-My life was turned upside down the day of my sixth-grade graduation. It's a subject we don't want to talk about. Ever. From there, things just got worse, so now. New town, new me. I won't let anyone close to me. Everyone in the end just hurts me and I don't think my heart, or my mental health can handle any more betrayals. So when Derek comes knocking on my cold, dead heart, I have to build higher and stronger walls. Because truth be told, I don't think I can keep saying no to him. But I have to. No matter how charming he is. Or how funny. Or how insanely hot he is. He'll just end up hurting me. Like him. The one who shall not be named. I'm not made for love. I learned that the hard way. Derek will have too as well.

entry.summary:

Summary: Stiles Stilinski moved to Poland after the events of the Nogitsune. He's been away from Beacon Hills ever since. Now, several years later, he's back and he's bringing a few familiar faces with him. The Nemeton has been visiting Stiles's dreams, telling him he needs to come home - so that's what he's going to do. entry.title: No Graves for the Forgotten
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,865Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 50

Summary: He’s the face behind the throne.The ghost of a golden palace.The man married to the monster who destroyed everything.Stiles Stilinski has learned how to disappear in plain sight — with soft lips, dangerous eyes, and a body trained to please, not to feel.Derek Hale should hate him.But everything about Stiles is a provocation: the low voice, the crooked smile, the whispered secrets in the shadows of rebellion.They meet by accident.Then, by necessity.Soon, by desire.But Stiles carries secrets that could bring empires down — and an emptiness only Derek seems to see.In a world where love is a weapon and loyalty is a convenient lie, some sparks don’t fade.They burn everything in their path.

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 54,902Chapters: 15/38Kudos: 23

Summary: Everyone in my story is dead. Alec has been a Beacon Hills resident and a McCall pack member for just over a year, and he’s finally starting to feel comfortable and safe after his near death experience at the hands of Monroe and her hunter army. He doesn’t want to get involved in the war ever again, content to play lacrosse and live his life.But Monroe isn’t finished yet, and she won’t rest until all supernatural people are wiped out for good. Her plans won’t allow Alec to stay uninvolved forever, and his past threatens to catch up with him no matter how badly he had hoped to keep those secrets buried.
